data.expected_result: App warns you that you cannot change that permission (like it does on PC), or nothing happens
data.short_description: App crashes when you try changing webhooks and dont have correct permissions
data.steps_to_repro: - Have permissions to manage server, manage channels, and manage roles (DO NOT HAVE ADMIN)- Go to any text channel- Select permissions-  Select any role-  Change "Manage webhooks" from neutral, to false or positive (doesnt matter which one)
